test=
RunStarted() - Called before any tests have been run.
testStarted() - Calle=
d when an atomic test is about to be started.
testRunEndedand() and testEnd=
ed() are similar.


For example, if you want to test class A, than
public c=
lass A {

 @Test
 public void testFirst(){}

 @Test
 public void testSecond=
(){}
}

testRunStarted() will be run once before any test method will be
in=
voked. Afterwards, moment before testFirst() will be invoked
testStarted() =
will be invoked, afterwards testFirst() will be invoked
and afterwards test=
Ended(). Afterwards, moment before testSecond()
will be invoked testStarted=
() will be invoked, afterwards testSecond()
will be invoked and afterwards =
testEnded(). Finally, testRunEndedand()
will be invoked.
